job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brImagine what you could do here At Apple new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishbrbrbrWe are seeking an experienced data scientist to join the Business Solutions team An expert in advanced analytics you are passionate about turning data into impactful insights and driving creative data science solutions You are skilled at creating analytical models and interactive visualizations You are a motivated selfstarter comfortable navigating through ambiguity to evaluate complex data analyze data from multiple angles build analytical workflows and use data science models to deliver findings that directly impact the business If this describes you then you should consider joining our teambrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br	Experienced in data science machine learning visualization and data storytelling passionate about drawing insights and hidden patterns from databrbr	Meticulous attention to detail data integrity and data wranglingbrbr	Skilled in Python or R for data science and SQL for querying databrbr	Highly proficient in Tableau or similar BI toolsbrbr	Ability to articulate complex data science concepts in business terms know how to tell a story to highlight key insights and present analysis effectively to key partnersbrbr	High intellectual curiosity to learn and understand business needsbrbr	Excellent interpersonal skills to collaborate with crossfunctional partners to share knowledge communicate findings and integrate feedbackbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brThe ideal candidate will have outstanding communication skills proven data science and advanced analytics capabilities strong business acumen and an innate drive to deliver results They will be a selfstarter comfortable with ambiguity and enjoy working in a fastpaced dynamic environmentbrbrKey Responsibilitiesbrbr	Develop custom models algorithms and interactive visualizations to deliver Supply Chain insights brbr	Wrangle and analyze data to identify patterns and trendsbrbr	Evaluate business needs through indepth conversations with business users to understand the domain and apply data science for insightsbrbr	Research and evaluate new technologies on data visualization machine learning modelingbrbr	Present key findings to leadership to evaluate business impact in nontechnical termsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong br	MS degree in Data Science Business Analytics Statistics or related fieldsbrbr brRole Number 200246788brbr
